note.p: Education: Queens' College, Cambridge; BA (1753), MA (1756), MD (1763)
Career: Fellow of Queens' (1756-1764); Professor of Chemistry (1756-1764); Physician, St Thomas's Hospital (1760-1764); Physician, Charterhouse (1763)
References: A A Mills and R Hall, 'The Production of a Plane Surface. As Illustrated by Specula From Some Early Newtonian Telescopes' in NR 1982-83 vol 37 pp 147-166
Charles H Cotter, 'The Mariner's Sextant and the Royal Society' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 23-36
H G Lyons, 'Two Hundred Years Ago: 1739' in NR 1939 vol 2 pp 34-42
Notes: According to Venn, he was 'an intimate friend of the poet Gray'
